alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 20 at 1:42PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Elko County through 215 PM PDT... At 138 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm 13 miles northeast of Wells, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph and snow pellets. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...The brief, intense snow pellets can cause visibility to drop rapidly to below on mile. In addition, accumulation on roads would cause slick spots to develop quickly. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hd Summit and US-93 northeast of Wells. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
